ADV.caption: Client display name
ADV.doc: The name of your application or business. This is what the creator will recognise your business as.
ADV.name: clientDisplayName

ADW.caption: environment
ADW.doc: The environment to which you want to connect (test or production environment). It is important to note that all test data must be sent to sandbox and conversely, all live data for production.
ADW.name: environment

ADY.caption: User id
ADY.doc: The unique phyllo user ID, provided by phyllo to identify that specific user on their database.
ADY.name: userId

ADZ.caption: User token
ADZ.doc: The unique SDK token generated by the "Create SDK token" api step.
ADZ.name: userToken

ADa.caption: Workplatform
ADa.doc: This is the id generated for each workplatform (e.g. instagram, twitter, Facebook). Instagram id = "9bb8913b-ddd9-430b-a66a-d74d846e6c66", Twitter id = "7645460a-96e0-4192-a3ce-a1fc30641f72", TikTok id = "aebfb529-657a-438b-a679-ecaed656ca04", Youtube id = "14d9ddf5-51c6-415e-bde6-f8ed36ad7054", Twitch id = "e4de6c01-5b78-4fc0-a651-24f44134457b", Facebook id = "ad2fec62-2987-40a0-89fb-23485972598c", Substack id = "fbf76083-710b-439a-8b8c-956f607ef2c1", Instagram Lite id = "fb7cafcf-60ed-468a-ad6d-6bb6899d0871", AdSense id = "3e6f4cdd-2119-4125-aa0d-86eee4e20fcc"
ADa.name: workPlatformId
